question: How many orders were placed in the last 30 days from today and what is the total revenue?
sql_template: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Sales.Orders.OrderID) AS TotalOrders, SUM(Sales.InvoiceLines.ExtendedPrice) AS TotalRevenue FROM Sales.Orders JOIN Sales.Invoices ON Sales.Orders.OrderID = Sales.Invoices.OrderID JOIN Sales.InvoiceLines ON Sales.Invoices.InvoiceID = Sales.InvoiceLines.InvoiceID WHERE Sales.Orders.OrderDate >= DATEADD(day, -%{{days}}%, %{{from_date}}%)
reasoning: This query counts distinct orders and sums the extended price from invoice lines for orders placed in the last N days. It joins Orders, Invoices, and InvoiceLines to get accurate revenue figures.
